CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name , "Credit Opportunities", IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EKJS", "Shared"), "Fund External", IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EKJh", "BAM"), "Fund Internal", IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EKJX", "PFG"), "Listed Issuers", IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EKJh", "BAM"), "Public Securities", IMAGE ("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150b000002EKJc", "PSG"), IMAGE ("/resource/1494353630000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/exclamation.png", "Inactive"))
CustomField.label: Business Group
